analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xcc983356bd1b451bbf45386414407aea7a746c25.sol:
	Contract TokentradeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xcc983356bd1b451bbf45386414407aea7a746c25.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xcc983356bd1b451bbf45386414407aea7a746c25.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
